title: How are you too young for kids to be on social media like Twitter and Facebook? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m sorry, but I do not understand the question. Are you trying to ask how young is too young to have social media accounts? If so, then I think it depends on the maturity of a kid more than their legal age. I’d say no one younger than 13, though. However, these teenage years might not be the best time to enter social media for their psyche.
